title: [K-12] Instructional Design Scenarios for HIV-Infected Individualsâ€™ Rehabilitation Strategies and Communication Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of rehabilitation medicine, HIV infection management, and basic principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: Developing educational design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen rehabilitation strategies and communication skills for individuals with HIV

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more problem-based learning scenarios for planning rehabilitation strategies for people living with HIV
Learners can develop a communication training module applying a client-centered approach and assess the ability to convey rehabilitation service needs
Learners can create and practice self-management educational materials applicable in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
